Paysley: Paysley Settings
Paysley redirects customers to Paysley to enter their payment information.
"Paysley": "Paysley은 고객이 결제 정보를 입력하도록 Paysley으로 리디렉션합니다."

Paysley: Title
This is the title which the user sees during checkout.
"Paysley": "이것은 체크 아웃하는 동안 사용자가 보는 제목입니다."

Paysley: Description
This is the description which the user sees during checkout.
"Paysley": "이것은 사용자가 체크 아웃하는 동안 볼 수있는 설명입니다."

Paysley: Access Key
This is the access key, received from Paysley developer portal. ( required )
Enable Logging
Enable transaction logging for Paysley.

Paysley: How to execute a Full Refund?
How to execute a Partial Refund?
On administration panel go to menu : Sales > Orders
Select the transaction that you want to refund
Click invoice menu on the left side
Click the invoice data on the right side
Click on Credit memo
Then click the refund button
On administration panel go to menu : Sales > Orders
Select the transaction that you want to refund
Click invoice menu on the left side
Click the invoice data on the right side
Click on Credit memo
Choose the product quantity that you want to refund at Qty to Refund column
"Paysley": "환불할 수량 열에서 환불할 상품 수량을 선택합니다."

Paysley: Click the Update Qty’s button
Input Refund Shipping, Adjustment Refund, Adjustment Fee
Then click the refund button
